name: 12-factor-agentops
description: A methodology for using AI agents safely and reliably. Built on proven DevOps, SRE, and learning science foundations. Provides validation skills and pattern extraction for framework compliance.

plugins.name: factor-compliance-checker
plugins.description: Validate patterns and contributions against 12-Factor AgentOps methodology
plugins.author: Brian Fuller

plugins.name: five-laws-auditor
plugins.description: Audit work for compliance with the Five Laws of AgentOps
plugins.author: Brian Fuller

plugins.name: pattern-extraction-assistant
plugins.description: Extract reusable patterns from production implementations
plugins.author: Brian Fuller

plugins.name: research-formatter
plugins.description: Format research contributions and case studies for the framework
plugins.author: Brian Fuller

plugins.name: cross-reference-validator
plugins.description: Validate and maintain cross-references between framework components
plugins.author: Brian Fuller

externalMarketplaces.name: agentops
externalMarketplaces.description: Production workflow plugins implementing 12-Factor AgentOps patterns - core-workflow (Research→Plan→Implement→Learn), devops-operations (Kubernetes/Helm/ArgoCD), and software-development (Python/JavaScript/Go).

externalMarketplaces.name: aitmpl
externalMarketplaces.description: AI Template Marketplace - 63+ plugins, 85+ agents, curated collection
